entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
